keys: les règles ont voyagé des auteurs
las reglas viajaron los programas de escritura

          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">Rules for Writers</string>
            <string language="en">Rules traveled Writers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtlinien reisten Verfasser</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les règles ont voyagé des auteurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As réguas viajaram escritores</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le regole hanno viaggiato produttori</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ταξιδεμμένοι κανόνες συγγραφείς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las reglas viajaron los programas de escritura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">or: Do as I say, not as I do(All the following rules are good rules but they are also supposed to be funny. Can you see why?)Modul 3 - Writing.Ingår i Engelska B - CFL.</string>
            <string language="en">or: Do carcasses in say, note carcasses in do

(all the following rules are good rules but they are also supposed to ask funny. Can you see why?)

Module 3 - Writing.

Is included in English B - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Engelska B</string>
            <string language="sv">engelska</string>
            <string language="sv">English B</string>
            <string language="sv">english</string>

            <string language="en">rules traveled writers</string>
            <string language="en">rules</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">oder: Tun Sie Karkassen im Sagen, sind 
Anmerkung Karkassen im do(all die folgenden Richtlinien gute 
Richtlinien, aber sie sollen auch lustiges bitten. Können Sie 
why?)Module 3 - Writing.Is eingeschlossen in englischem B - CFL sehen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ou : Faites les carcasses dans la parole, 
les carcasses de note dans le do(all les règles suivantes sont de 
bonnes règles mais elles sont également censées demander drôle. 
Pouvez vous voir le why?)Module 3 - Writing.Is inclus dans B 
anglais - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ou: Faça carcaças na palavra, as carcaças
da nota no do(all as seguintes réguas são réguas boas mas são 
supostas também pedir engraçado. Pode você ver o why?)Module 
3 - Writing.Is incluído em B inglês - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">o: Faccia le carcasse nell'opinione, le 
carcasse della nota nel do(all le seguenti regole sono buone regole ma
egualmente sono supposte di chiedere divertente. Potete vedere 
il why?)Module 3 - Writing.Is incluso in B inglese - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ή: Κάνετε τα σφάγια λέει μέσα, σημειώνει τα 
σφάγια στο do(all που οι ακόλουθοι κανόνες είναι καλοί 
κανόνες αλλά είναι επίσης υποτιθέμενοι για να ρωτήσουν αστείο. 
Μπορείτε να δείτε why?)Module 3 - που γράφει 
συμπεριλαμβάνεται στο αγγλικό β - CFL.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">o: Haga las caparazones en la opinión, las 
caparazones de la nota en do(all las reglas siguientes son buenas 
reglas pero también se suponen pedir divertido. Puede usted ver
el why?)Module 3 - Writing.Is incluido en B inglés - CFL.</string>
          </description>
